import React from 'react' import "./Products.scss"; import List from '../../components/List/List' import { useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; const Products = () => { const catId=parseInt(useParams().id) const [maxPrice,setMaxPrice]=useState(1000) const [sort,setSort]=useState(null) return (

setSort("asc")} />
setSort("desc")}/>
) } export default Products
